name: Claude Code Container
description: Automated GitHub issue processing system powered by Claude Code and Cloudflare Workers

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: Your Anthropic Claude API key from https://console.anthropic.com/

GITHUB_APP_PRIVATE_KEY.description: GitHub App Private Key in PEM format (copy the entire key including headers)

GITHUB_APP_ID.description: GitHub App ID number from your GitHub App settings

GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: GitHub Webhook Secret for signature validation

ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: 32-byte hex string for data encryption (generate with: openssl rand -hex 32)
